website_summaries.verdict: This popular planner offers users incredibly detailed layouts for productivity and holistic health.
pros: Daily view features sections for gratitude and hourly planning
Weekly layout covers overview of previous and coming weeks
cons: Many customers wish planner was dated

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this planner! It's just like the pictures, the quality of the paper and cover is great, and I love how it's made from recycled materials. The size in the description is correct (and I love it!).This planner helps me stay focused and motivated. I love how it's undated so I can make the most out of it since I may not need all the months of the year. I love the set up and the end of month, week, and day review. It helps me to be mindful of daily activities and how invest my time. Overall I think this planner is a great investment if you want to get your life in tract. :)
customer_reviews.author: Avatar Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to help one stay on track
customer_reviews.text: This is my SECOND Panda Pro . I took advantage of the Black Friday special so I'd be ready to roll when my current planner runs out. I love that the planner allows me to plan my month, my week and every single day. Focusing on what I'm grateful for and taking a few moments at the end of the day to evaluate my day are bonuses. Since using it I'm much more organized, productive and have an overall greater sense of accomplishment. Introducing it to our eldest college aged daughter and to my hubby. Grateful for a tool that helps me stay on track personally and professionally.
customer_reviews.author: jbe

customer_reviews.title: Superb Planner!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the planner and how simple it looks. I have not used it yet but I absolutely love how everything is laid out and broken down. The pages are super clean and easy to read and organize thoughts. I also enjoy that I can write whichever month I wish to start your planner. I wish, however, there would be a notes section so I can write contact numbers but I guess I can purchase sticky notes or put numbers in my phone! Overall, highly recommend it, in fact I had a few co-workers purchase one!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: This year I will slay!
customer_reviews.text: There is hope for me!! I am very disorganized, which is why I was drawn to this planner. It does not disappoint! First of all, the cover feels very luxe. There are three sections--the month, the week, and the day. And best of all--no dates written in. The prompts fit nicely with my practice of giving thanks and reflecting daily. I love that there is a space of affirmations, goals, a focus, everything! How did I live without it. Maybe, just maybe, this will be the year I get it together.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner - thin paper
customer_reviews.text: I adore this planner. It's what I've been wanting out of every other planner I've ever had but found lacking in one way or another. It is very large, but I like it. The soft and flexible cover is nice, yet durable. Also the layout is really nice. Everything in its place and not a space wasted. My ONLY complaint is the paper is thin and thus I get some bleed through and feathering. Especially when using fountain pens (which I use almost exclusively). I understand heavier paper would make it overall weigh more (and it's a hefty thing) but the paper quality is close to being a make it or break it quality for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa MullinsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: so good. I've been incredibly busy at work and found ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to try a paper based planner after being unable to find phone app that worked well for me. So far, so good. I've been incredibly busy at work and found that things were slipping through the cracks. This helps me prioritize and make sure that I am not forgetting anything. It is a little on the large side but I think it is necessary... one of the reasons that I was unable to find a satisfactory app is that it is hard to get a good view of everything that is going on unless you have some space to display it all.
customer_reviews.author: RainCityGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good system, good quality - Planner size not a fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind this planner is great - I just made the mistake of buying the pro, rather than the regular one. The Panda Planner Pro is large - roughly the size of a regular sheet of printer paper, and 3/4 of an inch thick. I knew the size of the Pro going into my order, but over-estimated how much I was going to be willing to lug it around with me. In my experience, the best planners are the ones that you can easily travel with. So, the system is great, and the quality was good, the size was just not what I ended up wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Marvel

customer_reviews.title: IT STINKS!!!!! UUUGGGHHH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my panda planner and the stench of it is assaulting my senses! It smells like burning tires or something. I an not sure I will even be able to use it the smell is so strong. I am almost positive the smell comes from the cover. Smells like they have made it our of recycled tires or something. While I support the whole recycling concept whole heartedly I am not sure how healthy it is to be around this organizer. I am very disappointed because the internal planner looks to be very well designed. I just cannot stand being around the smell.
customer_reviews.author: jodi Vallerga

customer_reviews.title: this one is good. I like the cover (though it did have ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm the type that gets all excited with a new planner. So far, this one is good. I like the cover (though it did have a slight odor, it's going away now). I'm looking forward to really get into all its uses. Couple of suggestions for the creators: Perhaps consider color coding the ribbons somehow, so one can tell which is which (monthly vs weekly vs daily). Add more weekly review pages and maybe one " notes" page in the back of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nieves

customer_reviews.title: not a year worth of pages
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for the monthly, weekly, and daily planning areas to keep me focused and organized. Unfortunately there is 12 months for the monthly planning, and only 6 months worth for the weekly and daily planning. This should be sold as a 6 month planner, not a year/12 month planner. Fairly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Time to take your life to another level
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever decided to get organized and start getting some purpose and drive.... You'll discover that all the life coaches and YouTube videos advocate certain things..... Goals.... And how to keep track of them. They say to do all the job priority tasks in the beginning and plan Plan plan.... This planner takes all that into account I just got it and it looks promising. I would have gave it 5 stars but it came damaged. I should just return but it's a hassle coupled with a burden. I recommend this planner for those looking to be better than typical.
customer_reviews.author: Philthy G

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are 3 bookmarks built in
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using this planner system, but I have tried a ton of them in the past. Many that help you keep track of personal goals and wishes (not just meetings and schedules) are more time intensive in the original set up, but this one is easier to use. The intro videos get a little long-winded, but they do help. I knocked off a star for the quality of the exterior of the product (easily scarred). I love that there are 3 bookmarks built in, so you can track monthly, weekly, and daily pages. I will revisit my review after I have used a while longer!
customer_reviews.author: Chanda McCall

customer_reviews.title: Send me old version black not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these. A black for me, blue for my wife and red for my son. The photos for all 3 show the new updated style. The blue and red were updated but my black one was the older version. The older version doesnt have the simplified daily view with added exercise options. Pretty bummed that they don't make it clear that you may not get what is in the photos. Be careful if you order black they may send you old stock which is all crammed into 2 page per week.
customer_reviews.author: Repres

customer_reviews.title: Panda Planner Pro, meh
customer_reviews.text: I liked the planner it's a bigger version of what I had couple months ago but the cover is flimsy its already falling apart, bending etc..the inseam toward the bind part is also looking like it will give. The smaller planner is still here intact while this one is a just a couple weeks in already looking rough. I wish the same material was used for the larger one to hold it together. I also thought the schedule part the times would be more expanded it's still 6a to 9p and I need more time slots.Besides that I like the layout of the planner more space.
customer_reviews.author: hq2133127

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Support!!! Attractive, fun & comprehensive planner!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Panda Planner, Sticky Notes and colored pens. Inside the planner were coupons to share with friends and links to videos by the founder to help more effectively utilize the Panda Planner to better organize and get excited about your monthly, weekly and daily goals, appointments and tasks. Wow. New to this but am already very stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H.

customer_reviews.title: An exciting planner
customer_reviews.text: The Panda Planner Pro is a little large but that's just so you can really plan out your day. I get excited just looking at it. Some people didn't like getting the videos that come with it but the links go to your email so they're not that hard to ignore if you prefer. I do like the YouTube tutorials on optimizing your Panda Planner Pro usage. Those are the first links and each video just takes a few minutes of your time. It's a great planner and the guy who made it is quite enthusiastic about his product.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Spina

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful but with a few downsides
customer_reviews.text: If you've seen the pictures, then you already know the content; which is well laid out and very useful. Four stars alone for that. Here's the downside. First of all, this is a full 8 1/2 x 11, thick and heavy book. You cannot tear out the pages and due to the layout and page type, it is not the easiest to fold flat. Again, the book itself is very well designed, I just wish they made it a little smaller with perforated pages.
customer_reviews.author: DStooks

customer_reviews.title: Its got monthly, weekly and Daily
customer_reviews.text: I am a young business entrepreneur, who has a very ACTIVE brain. In other words if its not written down its not getting done. I knew I wanted a planner, to get my life together.Panda Planner exceeded my expectations. I love writing down and planing out my whole year, my favorite aspect about the PANDA planner is it allows me to break down my LONG TERM yearly goals into ACHIEVABLE AND SHORTER monthly, weekly and daily GOALS all in one planner. I wake up to the planner and close out my day on my planner. Its the best gift I have ever gifted myself
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy M Kiboro

customer_reviews.title: Great planner
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite planner. I love that it doesn’t have dates in it so I can fill it how I choose. It’s large and it has space for everything including goals and daily affirmations. It helps my mom brain so much and it keeps me organized. I used to use my phone for everything but writing things down is so much for helpful for me. The quality is also great! I didn’t think I would like the larger size but I actually love it more than the smaller planners I’ve had. I definitely recommend the panda planner!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I loved my other Panda planner which covered a full year so I could plan a full year out. The current Panda Planner which I ordered this month only covered 6 months so now I will have to spend twice the amount and will have to keep up with 3 different planners which now makes it not worth the trouble. Since you have to date each month for the entire year manually anyway...why would they just make a calendar for 6 months and to me it looks just as thick as my planner that’s for an entire year...
customer_reviews.author: Kuntri.357

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This planner is fantastic. It helps you plan out your monthly goals, to your weekly and daily tasks. I recommend watching the videos the creator provides because it gives you a better understanding how to stay organized. Seems intimidating at first, but the videos are helpful. It is larger in size, but I appreciate that because there never seems to be enough room in the traditional planners. The Panda Planner Pro asks what you're grateful for, how to improve yourself, helps you remind yourself of a positive daily habit & even helps you break down an hourly schedule. Its for 6 months, but totally worth the investment. I look forward to using it every morning and evening.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany DeBlasio

customer_reviews.title: Planning calendar starts on a Sunday, not a Monday
customer_reviews.text: This planning calendar starts on a Sunday, not a Monday, which is completely impractical. A "kitten calendar" starts on Sunday, which is fine, but I want my focused planning calendar to start on Monday. Since the entire thing is undated, why not leave the days of the week blank too, so that the customer can set the start day of the week? The videos could use some work. I did not like the speed-talking narration.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Ogilby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've been enjoying my Panda Planner Pro for a little over a month now. Glad I went with the larger size. It offers me good room for daily activities and plenty of space to prioritize things to do. The weekly review has been helpful to monitor my goals. I use a fountain pen often and the paper quality if good. Solid cover yet flexible enough to easily fit into my computer bag. My Assistant is buying one after seeing mine. I still use my phone calendar to alarm me of events but having things in writing again has already helped me stay on top of opportunities rather than missing because of how easily you can look through your day.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy C.

customer_reviews.title: good enough, yucky smell
customer_reviews.text: Large, 6 month book., seems durable. Just using ball point pen and paper is fine for that medium. Has nasty chemical smell to it which made it lose a star. Does not have a pen holder but has a folder in back for loose papers, and has 3 bookmarks to keep your monthly, weekly, and daily places. Highly recommend if you're looking for a detailed agenda/quick journal type of book.
customer_reviews.author: zensm

customer_reviews.title: The binding feels like the pages will fall out if you push too ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price tag, I expected higher quality. The binding feels like the pages will fall out if you push too hard. It's a nice concept to have leather but it's not easy to keep the planner open without holding it down and again, I feel that if I do hold it down all the way the pages will come loose. It needs improvement, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Will definitely buy again. Has so many options and things I never thought of planning and hitting down that make it helpful. Also, I thought I’d never like a dateless setup but it is the BEST! I went into surgery and my usually busy lifestyle changed to where I don’t need it as much right now. I can easily set it aside and not waste any pages and pick right back up when I ready. I love it! Oh - the only thing I’d add is tabs. I really wish it had tabs to make everything easier to find. Had to buy my own and add them.
customer_reviews.author: Katy TX

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Organization
customer_reviews.text: I have had this planner for about 10 days and it is awesome! I am a huge fan of this planner and this brand. So many nice little features like daily affirmations and checklists and even online access to some info on how to live better etc. Having the monthly weekly and daily sections greatly helps me plan my life and stay on top of big and little projects. I run a vacation rental business on top of a full-time job and this is going to save me so much time on circling back through unorganized notepads. The price is steep but its hard to argue with saving hours of your life and feeling more on top of your game.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Productivity and positive vibes, panda style
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved planners, as they help me to stay organized and productive. This one, however is by far my favorite. It breaks your day down in ways that I've never gotten from other planners, plus it forces you to think positively about each step. It works on improving yourself and becoming an overall better person while also learning to stay organized. I would highly recommend this to anyone! This particular version of the panda planner is also very large, with lots of room to write. The material is very nice too, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jilly-Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great for project management and home organisation
customer_reviews.text: I really like the layout of this planner and materials feel higher quality than most notebooks I've used. I'm a project manager and have mostly used bullet or straight ruled notebooks. Thought I would try this on a whim and the pro is perfect for how I organise my thoughts. For home organisers you probably would want the regular size and not the pro unless you find yourself taking several pages of notes daily. I also grabbed the multi stickys book and it's been convenient not having a full notebook of the same color/size stickies. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Warhawk

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful tool - plan to buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love my Panda Pro. Over my career I've used a wide variety of planning tools. When I had to transition from corporate office to working remotely, I looked for new planning tool. I re-evaluated my work day and tools and spent a lot of time thinking about what was working/not working and how to move forward into a more mindful lifestyle. Panda Pro a is a good fit for me. It's well constructed and organized. Like some other users, I would prefer a color more distinctive than the gray page marker since it is too close to white. Also hoping for wider selection of colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kate c

customer_reviews.title: In a high pressure sales world it is easy to get off track
customer_reviews.text: Boom! This thing has changed my daily productivity. In a high pressure sales world it is easy to get off track. Since starting this I have been far more productive and gotten all of the little things done. What I really love is the morning review. It puts your day into perspective... If your day is going bad you look at what you are appreciative of and and what you are looking forward to and it probably everything in perspective. Great planet and I will use for the foreseeable future! Get it and try it. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ole

customer_reviews.title: Great planner!
customer_reviews.text: This planner is great, it helps me to focus on the good things and helps me achieve my goals without feeling like I’m failing. It helps to keep me motivated while I’m working to plan better and get more done. The only thing that I wish is that the hourly break down extended later my schedule is different and I wish the time didn’t stop at 9:30, I’d like to go to at least 11pm. But it’s not a huge issue i can deal with it because I love the rest of the planner.
customer_reviews.author: TOMAS NOLASCO

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had a passion planner last year and it didn't give me the space I needed to do things. I looked at what seems like millions of planners and the Panda Planner was chosen. I like the larger size and spaces for things like habits, affirmations, priorities, etc. I kinda wish I didn't have the weekly review section and had more daily planning sections instead, but that's just a personal preference. I highly recommend this planner if you are trying to organize your life a little more, like me.
customer_reviews.author: MojoJojo

customer_reviews.title: There is a thing of too much organization and planning
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how separated the month, week, days were. I never want to use the month and week options because I have to flip back and forth. I have always used planners and thought I would like this one. But it actually has been a time waster instead of making me more efficient. I am a personality that feels the need to fill everything in and answer all the questions. There is just too much here and ends up taking hours extra every week and doesn't increase my effectiveness. I'm considering just going back to my blue sky planner and throwing this one out and I'm not even halfway through it.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: It Arrived Damaged Sadly
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure I’m going to enjoy this planner but I wish I’d listened to other reviewers and ordered directly from the company. My planner came with the top edges and front cover crumpled. And while it’s just cosmetic it’s something that really makes me anxious and takes away from my enjoyment of the product. I guess when you purchase something you expect it to be pretty perfect and this definitely isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Michelegg

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed and useless
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this planner. It is probably the worse planner I have ever gotten. I should have done a more thorough research on this planner before purchasing a $30 useless planner. The month’s, week, and daily pages are separated from each other. There are 13 monthly pages. 27 weekly pages, and about 190 day pages. I assumed this planner would last for a year, instead of 6 months. The only thing positive I can say is that the planner Itself appears to be a durable, quality product
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Troxclair

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Little on the expensive side. I don't think I like that it's not dated, but on the plus side, it means I don't have to use it every day, but can use it when I need the planning help! Wasn't quite what I was looking for either. But I love pandas, so I was drawn to it and pretty much that's the only reason I bought it. We'll see how it goes and if I use it. I'm starting my own business and hoping it'll help keep me organized and on task.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin K.

customer_reviews.title: Seize the day!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying this brand and I really like it. Planners are a very personal thing and what works for one doesn’t always work for another. The Panda brand has several options and I was very pleased when I found it on Amazon! This particular planner is the Pro-full size- so if you’re looking for something compact, check out their other styles. Two call outs to be aware of- first it’s not dated so you can customize it to your needs. Secondly it’s a six planner and has a nice page layout that I find user friendly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Not enough weekly pages
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner but it only has 26 weekly pages...about 6 months but has 12 monthly pages. I really like the week pages but why would you put a book together that didn't have enough weeks to fill the months and days? Now I have a planner that is only halfway used up but I don't have any more week pages left? That's a deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jensen

customer_reviews.title: A Little Too Thorough For Actual Productivity
customer_reviews.text: It's a very thorough planner and it has a lot of great qualities. I was diagnosed with ADHD inattentive type and thought this would help. It did help but the time I spent writing and planning was super annoying and to be honest.....starting ADHD medication made me even more annoyed by this planner task. (I take Vyvance). Not knocking the product in general, just the fact that maybe it is too thorough for some people not needing reminders about staying positive or checking off accomplished goals.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rackley

customer_reviews.title: Seems that there was a lot of Chemicals used for it (what arises bad Feelings in Terms of Health as it is intended ...
customer_reviews.text: The Content of the Planner with it's Worksheets fits my Needs by 95% and has deserved 5*. But the Material (Cover AND Pages) smells awful even after several Weeks of aerating... Seems that there was a lot of Chemicals used for it (what arises bad Feelings in Terms of Health as it is intended to be an Tool for intensive daily use). If a Planner costs nearly 40$ (and above all suggest environmental Care with It's name and it's Promotion) I expect perfection in all Regards. So for this Issue only 1* and overall 3*. I will try another Copy after this one is stuffed and if this Issue persists the second one will be my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex O.

customer_reviews.title: Best Planner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Panda Planner and I absolutely love it. I keep it open at my desk at work to help me keep track of my to do lists and priorities, as well as goals (big and small) for the day. I love the format - and i particularly love that there is a space for monthly, weekly and daily planning. Also its a great way to keep a journal for people who are too busy to sit down every day and do it! I love the spaces for gratitude, goals and focus each day. If i could have designed a planner for myself it would be the panda planner!
customer_reviews.author: KTsky

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great planner. It has everything I was looking for. I can plan out my month, then plan my week (one week at at time) and my day (one day at a time). This helps me plan my itinerary down to the smallest level and plan for things coming in the future. It'S a great size and I love the feel of it. It seemed as though some of the reviewers here were looking for a hard covered book. This is not, but I think that's great. It makes the book flexible and fits inside my bag next to my laptop without breaking the spine or covers. Love this planner.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Increases Productivity (keeps you grounded, focused, and poised for victory)
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have given this 10 starts. I use my iphone for a lot of daily planning, but when I write it down... I find it reinforces the message and is less likely to get lost in the "digital shuffle." This is the very best planner out there. I really enjoy the daily tasks it has me being more focused. I especially like the "Today's wins" and "How I'll Improve" sections. It helps me to look back throughout the weeks and months, gives me a guide to follow up on some the wins and see if they are progressing further. I have already recommended the Panda Planner to 3 co-workers.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the move being in a pre-sales role, so it is very important to keep track and stay on top of things. The Panda Planner helps with daily schedules, making it very easy to keep track of the smallest of things, which is great. I use the Panda Planner along with Siri to remind me of important things, and it is a good combination and keeps me on track everyday. It is either writing in a diary or something like this. This makes the daily affair more streamlined and helps you gather your thoughts faster based on the sections.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GOAL SETTING PLANNER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this planner...but keep in mind that this is a GOAL SETTING planner. It is not a typical planner and that is what makes it so great! Several reviewers stated that they were upset that this was only a six month planner. The Panda Pro is a full size planner and is already over an inch thick...so if it were 12 months it would be a 2 inch thick planner... too cumbersome to carry around! I love being able to set goals in it, track my progress, review what I did well, and what I need to improve upon. Mine came with 3 different color ribbons to separate the monthly, weekly, and daily sections.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Not as organized as they claim .
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find it easy to use at all the calendar was separate from the other sections nothing was cohesive . I had to end up buying new planner . I didn’t receive the software as promised with the planner as well .
customer_reviews.author: Coko Camille

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled, for the past year, to find a planner that works with my brain and my crazy busy life. I’m able to get everything I need written down in one spot. As a wife, mom, college professor, and network marketer, I need my life to be organized. I like that this planner has a daily AND monthly section. My days can be pretty fully planned out on ONE page. That’s fantastic. It helps me see my day at a glance. I love that I can write down goals and gratitudes too.
customer_reviews.author: krisler

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading how popular the Panda planners were, I was excited to order this planner. However, I am not impressed! Pros: It has a pocket in the back cover, the pages are thick and of good quality. Cons: I’ve decided I like the wire bound planners better, do not like that I have to fill in all the month/date info for every month, week and day sections. The weekly/daily sections should be directly behind corresponding month. Not each part a separate section, especially since there are NO tabs. I feel this planner would make my day more complicated, not simpler. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MARGIE B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, thick pages, not dated.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't change my life. I'm not an organizer person but reading the reviews inspired me. I purchased one for me and my sister. My sister loves it and uses it daily! She is so happy with it. I used mine once. It isn't guna make you an organizer person if you aren't. I wish I didn't spend so much on it for myself. I don't regret a penny for my sister Though since she loves it. Very handy the pages aren't dated.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Practicing gratitude is key
customer_reviews.text: I started using this planner at the beginning of 2018. So far I really like it, especially the daily section for writing down what you are greatful for and what you are excited about. There is such a mind shift when you practice gratitude vs thinking about what you don't have or want. The book is well bound and if using it daily will last for six months. I do wish it was smaller though. I realize there is also a smaller version for sale, but that one will only last for three months, which is why I went for the larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best Planners Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through numerous planners/organizers since 1994 and have never found one system that I loved enough to endorse until now. Even in this day and age of technology and software, I still prefer pen and paper over electronic data and Panda Planners make it easy for me to finally commit to one system. These are the best planners hands down and only wish these were around sooner. Who knows how much more I would've accomplished with these by my side.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas M.

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with the format of the planner and like the ...
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this, I was looking for something to replace the Franklin Planner I had been using, but which was not quite fitting what I needed. I am really happy with the format of the planner and like the capability to meaningfully plan on a monthly, weekly, and daily basis in something that is not too bulky. I was not sure how I would like having an undated planner, but it is working just fine and actually is keeping me from wasting pages on days when I don't need it. I will be looking for another one when this one is full.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Need organization, consistency, and a bit of happiness? This planner can help you organize life!
customer_reviews.text: This lady here can go through some planners. Because I don't stay consistent. People, stick with this planner! I have been through so many and this one provides solid consistency. Once you get it into the flow you need it is amazing! Stick with this planner. It can help you design better happiness, focus and dedication to your "plan", whatever it maybe this can help make you successful!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Stineback

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Planner to not only organize your day, but your life
customer_reviews.text: This planner has by far exceeded my expectations. I have been reading a lot of self development books lately and really wanted to start implementing some of the habits suggested such as affirmations, strict time management with scheduling my plans by hour, daily and weekly goal reviews, and much much more. This planner has provided me a place to do all of that. I have found my productivity increase drastically since getting it as well as a noticeable improvement in my mental and emotional clarity. I highly recommend purchasing this planner and using it to the full extent of it's potential!
customer_reviews.author: Anuar Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great planner. I needed to get back to paper in front of me. My phone/computer calendar and task lists just weren't doing it for me. This planner has everything you need and I also actually really like some of the more "touchy feely" aspects even though I didn't expect to use them. Having a book in front of me that I can jot in, move things, and check things off has been great for keeping me focused,
customer_reviews.author: AFuji

customer_reviews.title: Great planner!
customer_reviews.text: Great planner, this is my 2nd one. Functionally, it’s the best undated planner with an amazing design that’s helped me stay on top of things. As a therapist and grad student a good planner is essential and this has been my favorite. I that it includes the task section, priorities AND an hourly section for appointments. My only issue was the elastic band breaking on my last one and some leather pealing off around the edges (likely due to a few months of regular use). Definitely still worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: AJS88

customer_reviews.title: Setting Goals and Reflecting on Your Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner for myself as a New Years gift. It is the most useful product I have found for organization, planning, goal setting and reflection. It is very therapeutic. There are many versions of the planner. It is a nice large tool with a very soft cover. This one seemed most complete for needs, but I would love to purchase several other versions in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Planner only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the calendar. I was looking for one that would last me for a full year. I use my calendar for work as well as personal. It is only for 6 months. It was not advertised as a 6 month planner, unfortunately I started writing in it already & will have to find another one for the last 6 months of 2020. It won't be a PANDA Planner.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Panda Planner is a Winner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about two weeks and so far I am really liking it. I don't know if there is such a thing as a "perfect" planner or organizational system, however the Panda Planner gets fairly close. This system takes some work, which is a good thing if you are looking for more than just a To Do List (I highly recommend checking out the product videos). I enjoy the overall set-up of pages for weekly and daily goals and activities. The morning review section on the daily page can get a little repetitive, but I understand what the system is trying to do. Overall excellent product that I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Stop going through the motions!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Panda Planner for nearly a month now and absolutely love it! Beyond the practical schedule/to-do list concept one would expect from a planner system, this design forces you to reflect and look for opportunities of growth. In the schedule-crazed lives we live, it's easy to simply make lists and timelines and go through the motions of life. Using the Panda Planner creates another opportunity to stop the madness of doing and running and actually think about gratitude, optimism, reflection and goals. Truly a great system and would recommend to anyone looking to go beyond simple scheduling!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: If you want to improve yourself, this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: So yes, it's a lot of writing. However, if you're committed to improving yourself this is for you! I've noticed that I am much more productive and efficient with my time. I am also cognizant of moments when I lose optimism and work on regaining it-with the help of daily affirmations and gratitude list. Love pandavist! So happy I took a chance (I researched it after seeing it on a girl friend's instagram). Like anything, commitment and consistency is key!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago25

customer_reviews.title: Hello, my name is Joe, and I have a Panda Planner Pro.  See Joe go!
customer_reviews.text: I got the smaller one several months ago. It was okay. This? I love this! It is perfect for what I'm looking for in a planner. I do not want lots of note taking space. I use a Moleskine for notes. This planner keeps me motivated and organized and on task. Those are challenges for me on a daily basis. I work in management consulting and real estate so I'm busy, and I tend to chase shiny objects... This help me focus. It is not all things to all people, but I like it. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: it's like they knew exactly what I wanted and how I ...
customer_reviews.text: Today was day one using the planner. I have been working on my self as a whole,and have been writing in a spiral note book, until today! I was planning each day and writing encouraging quotes with out any order or organization. This was working, but when I got this planner, it's like they knew exactly what I wanted and how I wanted it organized lol. Great product, I look forward to owning it. Nice black leather binding, keeps it very professional. THANKS FOR SPREADING YOUR KNOWLEDGE. PEOPLE HELPING PEOPLE! ITS WHAT WE NEED, THANKS PANDA PLANNER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great planner, just takes a lot of time.
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner a lot. The only thing is, as a mother to an infant, who works and goes to school full time, I’m finding that using this planner daily is tough. I LOVE the monthly area and the weekly. I can easily find enough time on Sunday night to plan out my week. In all, I hope to see a strictly monthly/weekly planner. I do see there is a daily planner so having the other end separately would be great. But in all, it’s a great planner for time management.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 6 month planner...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great planner and don't mind paying this price, but for 6 months?? In July, I want to refer back to Jan-June without needing to pull out another planner. I loved the monthly and weekly pages, too bad you cannot combine the weekly pages with the daily journal section that takes up way too much space. I'd rather see more note pages than a single page for every single day. My job duties span a year, not 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: M &.

customer_reviews.title: Save your time & money not really a "yearly planner"
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a large notebook sized planner that had weekly & daily...which is next to impossible to find. I've had several different planners over the years and this is the FIRST one to advertise as yearly and only have enough pages for MAYBE half a year. FALSE ADVERTISING! The unfortunate part is I didn't realize this was NOT a yearly planner until I already filled out some of the pages. So now I've flushed $40 down the drain and have to buy a planner that actually has pages for an entire year. Complete rip off and the description needs to disclose that it does not cover a full year.
customer_reviews.author: Phal

customer_reviews.title: Good, but somewhat disjointed.
customer_reviews.text: It's good. It keeps me organized, focused and positive. My only real complaint is that there are 12 monthly pages, 26 weeks and roughly 1/2 a year for daily...either make the entire planner 1 year or 6 months, not some weird spawn of both. To me, for a planner to be disjointed is kind of a negative. However, I do like the Panda Planner...I just wish they would figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: The gratitude and review sections make this more than a typical calendar planner!
customer_reviews.text: Great planner! The various sections from gratitude to what I'm excited about really help make this a fun and rewarding tool to use. Having a place to record wins and what I'll do better is also helpful. The only negative is that the new planner had a very distinct chemical smell to it (not a good new book smell) that took a couple of weeks to wear off. Otherwise I love the heavy pages and the look and feel of the physical book as well as how the planner is set up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Groth

customer_reviews.title: Time Management To The Rescue....
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using the product this evening, but I can tell that if I stay disciplined and fill it out daily. that it will keep me more on track and focused with my time throughout the day. I also like that it makes me think first thing each morning, and not just about business it also forces me to think deeper on a personal level. There were also several downloads that I received with the product that I am really looking forward to diving into that will teach me to be more disciplined with my time. I will check back after a few weeks to update where I am with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Silverbeard

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner
customer_reviews.text: The planner is wonderful. It allows for someone to plan ahead and list their goals. The shipping was fast. Once inspected the binding was tight, and there were no loose pages. I like personally that this planner can easily customized to fit each personal individually. I have several different things going on at one and this allows for planning and notes. I would recommend this planner to others- especially those attempting to reorganize and prioritize.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Too much going on
customer_reviews.text: Honestly there is just too much going on with this planner. You’ll spend most of your life planning and very little of it actually doing anything. Plus it just gives me more to have to remember or refer back to. I thought this would help organize my life but it just made it more confusing. Plus it’s way too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Pro About it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second panda planner for college, but the first "pro" planner. I needed something to help me keep up with my online summer classes, but it didn't help me at all and the pages were very simple with no room for daily tasks and goals. Most of the pages are filled with a daily schedule and you have a weekly tasks section, which is nice, but panda planner isn't for me and I honestly don't know who it would be good for. Maybe a house wife?
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Provides clarity on day-to-day tasks
customer_reviews.text: I started using this planner a few weeks ago as an experiment to create a little bit more organization in my day-to-day. I wanted to orient my life more towards my key goals and live more intentionally. This planner has given me that opportunity, and more so! After using it only a few weeks, I feel my day-to-day tasks are more organized and better laid out. The outline of the daily planning forces me to think carefully on how to spend my valuable time, and it has given my life a new level of clarity and lightness. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Billiet

customer_reviews.title: Even on days when I'm not so great at utilizing the planner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this planner. My productivity and motivation had been severely lacking. It seems crazy that writing things in plans for a month, a week, and a day would help so much, but it has. Even on days when I'm not so great at utilizing the planner, I'm still productive just knowing it's on my kitchen table. I'll absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviews, but I had to write about this planner. I've tried so many different planners in the past including the very expensive Erin Condren planner and was very unsatisfied with it. I love the Panda planner pro because it allows me to stay focus on my priorities while also acknowledging different aspects of my life. I also purchased this planner for my boyfriend and he loves it as well. The only thing that I do not like about this planner is the soft cover. I wish the panda planner pro had a hardcover because the soft cover is very flimsy. Other than that I am obsessed with this planner and recommend it to any busy student!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Planner!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the Panda Planner Pro and I highly recommend it. It is not as repetitive as some of the other planners I have tried. The pages are thicker and pens don't bleed through the way they have in other planners. The daily page layout is excellent for my use - allowing for a focus, a habit, a schedule, notes, goals, to do, etc, and then a reflection of the day all in one place. I haven't found another planner that has the same components. . The planner is also secular which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon. I love the idea of planners, but I have terrible follow-through. I appreciate that this planner is undated so that if I do miss a day it's not a glaring mistake I have to look at/get overwhelmed by. I also love the mindfulness built in -- I find that I start and end my work days happier because this makes me think about what I'm thankful for, what I'm excited for, and what wins I had throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: patriciaeff

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: The panda planner is large (just a tad smaller than a regular sized piece of paper). It appears to be bound with quality and the pages are pretty thick - so that my thin line markers do not bleed thru to the other page. I like that the pages are not in order by day and are left blank - that way if I skip a day of journaling my input, i'm not off or have any wasted pages. You can tell a lot of thought went in to this journal. Wish me luck on fulfilling my dreams and aspirations as I utilize it's contents.
customer_reviews.author: Grace reigns

customer_reviews.title: Best business/personal planner EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Really love that I can have a month to month, week to week, and day to day planner. This has helped me soo much to stay on task and keep my appointments lined up. First thing I do when I get to work is look and see what I have to do. Perfect for business and personal planning combined.
customer_reviews.author: kay w.

customer_reviews.title: Best planner around!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice planner, which includes a variety of unique productivity and personal growth fields. It beats a plain old planner any day. I especially enjoyed the additional online supplemental information and the owner's story about how this planner came to be. I will definitely buy again in six months.
customer_reviews.author: daveinperry

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has monthly
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to hold me more accountable while also focusing on the positive things in life. This has been exactly what I was looking for. It is keeping me on target with my goal setting, and goal attainment! I love that it has monthly, weekly and daily breakdowns. I can really make sure that I spend my time wisely, reflect on how things are going and set improvement goals for myself. I would highly recommend. While it is large, it always me to get all the details in there, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Npaus

customer_reviews.title: Great planner! Wish it was more petite, but I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! This planner has helped me to improve my productivity, as well as maintain a positive perspective on my work days. The only thing I wish would change about this planner is the massive thickness. It gets difficult to cram the planner in your work purse and lug it around everyday. I also think the folded pocket in the back of the planner should be made of something more durable than pape. Lastly, it’d be nice if there were a daily habits checklist section, and if the planner cane with stickers to place on your calendar.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love the content of the planner
customer_reviews.text: Love the content of the planner, the organization, and the monthly, weekly, and daily views. I also love that the pages are thick and sharpie ink will not bleed through it. Dislike the seams of the book tearing open and exposing the thread keeping the planner together. The craftsmanship is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: BEST PLANNER OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the smaller panda planner (not the pro) & just filled it up & had to upgrade to the pro! LOVE the Panda Planner. Can't go wrong with either, I personally like the bigger size & that it lasts a full year. Pricy, yes, but totally worth the price. Helps with my productivity & keeps me focused & motivated throughout the day. Will buy again when I finish this one! I recommend watching the video tutorials on youtube once you get the planner to get maximum benefit from it.
customer_reviews.author: Haddie

customer_reviews.title: This is helping me to get my s**t together...and in a positive way.
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate this planner. I have used other planners (even had formal training to use some of them) and I have to say this is up front, easy to use and it causes you to reflect on your past, present and future. The planner helps you to ponder not only how awesome you are, but how you will improve where needed. I only hope I end up like the lady in the video who owns a cupcake shop and has time to go to the gym. I may be asking too much.
customer_reviews.author: CRam

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to plan and track for progress
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to plan and track for progress! I started using my planner two weeks ago, the detail in the planning makes me remember what i'm supposed to do. I wish you can actually date the pages, although there is something to dating them myself, counting and planning for the dates. My favourite part of the day is waking up to the planner :-), still working on the end of day reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I really like this planner a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this planner a lot. The prompts are great for getting myself mentally organized at the beginning and end of each day/week/month. My only gripe is the size - it's very large especially since I usually write in it in bed. When I need to replace it, I'll probably buy the smaller size (I initially bought the larger size because I like the layout better compared to the small size)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: 16 YEAR OLD SON USING FOR ORGANIZATION AND DISCIPLINE
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son liked my planner so much that he wanted me to order one for him. He wanted the Pro version because he writes larger and the pros larger size works better for him. He is not naturally organized or disciplined and this is really helping him both in school and life. First planner he likes and is actually using!
customer_reviews.author: HealthyNonna

customer_reviews.title: Revision: to previous review 12 months included
customer_reviews.text: Checked and recheck Months pages attached ... cannot tell why... I am able to separate them with knife. At first the layout was diffcukt to get used to; I like the accountability effect. I wish the planner had a larger note section- I find I am carrying a notebook in addition to planner - I write things Down - don’t put in iPhone I apologize for misleading review .. wish I knew how to delete....
customer_reviews.author: chrysalis1023

customer_reviews.title: Great not-so-little planner
customer_reviews.text: We're not as young as we were yesterday. Having a bigger planner helps a lot. This has a great breakout and is very useful. I had hoped instead of months / weeks / days it was month-weeks of the month-days of the month, next month.... but in retrospect that would have been a logistical nightmare with weeks broken up inside months, and.... yes. This works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Washington

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy with this schedule book
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with this schedule book. It really is working excellent for me and I find myself completing more tasks and evaluating my day so I can organized and accomplish in different ways that work for me. Definitely watch the videos just to help you with ideas on what to write and how to break down big tasks
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The Best Daily Planner I Have Used Thus Far!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a daily planner that would combine sufficient structure with space for flexibility and personalization. I have purchased and started many other planner systems which I will not name here. I abandoned each one as they failed to address my planning requirements. I can safely say the Panda Planner is here to stay. It keeps me organized and on target, yet allows flexibility and unexpected changes to the day's schedule. It has a section for daily gratitude and daily improvements, so I am aware of becoming a more well rounded and happy person. Unlike my previous planner systems, I look forward to opening the Panda Planner and both planning and then executing the plans.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Winker

customer_reviews.title: Love this Planner
customer_reviews.text: I have used another planner system for years and really liked it, yet it was bulky to carry around and expensive. I tried an online system which was not a good fit, and found that I really wanted a physical paper system. I switched to a smaller planner and it did not have enough room. I feel like the story of Goldilocks and the three Bears. I tried out the Panda Planner and this one is “just right!” Right size not bulky, right price, and has positive features that I like to track my days and goals. Thank you Panda!
customer_reviews.author: Lana R Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Found the best planner to get busy life in focus
customer_reviews.text: Since buying my Panda Planner Pro, I’ve seen my organization and time all together. I’ve been struggling on a planning system to use with my work and this has both personal and professional all in one. Really love the layout, free videos that come with the purchase, and how I keep developing. Will continue to buy it again and again as I run out. Love the size since I need to see it laid out larger than most bullet journals or other planners. I highly recommend to anyone to try.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Why do i have to listen to vulgarity to learn to use this product?
customer_reviews.text: Yep, I bought the planner, register and listen to the videos. What I took away from the videos is this person believes he can only get his message across using vulgarity. Hey, take a lesson from the "big boys" in your industry and treat your customers with respect not someone in a men's locker room discussing items without a vocabulary of a 13 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite But Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Of the others I've tried, so far, this is the best. I still have to past my schedule from Outlook on the page because the calendar lines were not big enough. I have also fashioned this into a diary so I can keep everything, my date book, tasks, and important meeting notes in one place. If a lined diary was ever on the list of products to try with consumers, I'd be the first in line to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mmc

customer_reviews.title: Not advertised correctly - NOT a Daily Planner
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the daily planner, but a weekly planner. First I received a weekly planner, that stated Non-Dated Daily Planner" on the sleeve, so I returned it thinking it was just the wrong sleeve. Well, I received the same item again - a weekly planner labeled as Daily. I'm keeping it because I need a planner ASAP, it's just super frustrating that this isn't as described.
customer_reviews.author: elledee

customer_reviews.title: Best Planner For The #goaldigger
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this planner! I have the hardest time staying organized and it helps so much. This planner has a month, week, and day view and is focused on achieving your goals. It helps you start your day on a positive note with a gratitude list & things to look forward to. It also has a space for daily, weekly, and monthly review. It has really helped me focus on achieving my goals!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this planner. I use it daily, and appreciate that there are no pre-printed dates on it for those times that I dont use it on a particular day (doesnt go to waste). The "pro" version of it is quite large. You can't quite put it into perspective from the photo, but its a heavy planner. I almost wish I bought the smaller one, but was caught up on the fact that I would need more space to write. Oh well! Next year!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sullivan

product_meta.title: Panda Planner Pro - Best Daily Planner for Happiness & Productivity - 8.5 x 11" Softcover - Undated Day - Guaranteed to Get You Organized - Gratitude & Goals Journal
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackMy life was a mess I was reeling from a combination of Lyme disease, traumatic brain injury and cancer. A perfect storm of sadness, stress, overwhelm and anxiety. In My desperation to find a solution to My depression and lack of productivity, I created a system to overcome My challenges and get back on track. Introducing the Panda Planner Pro; a new version of the original Panda Planner that lasts twice as long with the same results. Panda Planner Pro is based on scientific studies that are proven to increase productivity and happiness over time. Panda Planner Pro makes you productive & Happy! Improve productivity, end procrastination and feel happier everyday with the Panda Planner Pro! The design is based on principles from scientific studies proven to increase productivity & happiness over time. Focus & organization, all in one place Our unique planner system will help you prioritize your tasks and keep you accountable! It’s time to get organized! Crush your goals not only are you getting one of the best planners out there, you’re getting 7 different eBooks and a video Series to help you hit your goals fast, absolutely free! - how to cure procrastination 
- a billionaire's top 5 productivity secrets 
- how to get in shape fast & more! Plus get access to a video mini-course that will 10x your productivity. Normally $49, yours is free. Details on page 1 of the planner. **This Panda Planner Pro is designed to last between 6-9 months** guaranteed remember, we're here for you If you need us. If you’re not happy, We aren’t either and promise to make it right whenever you need us. Thousands of people are already enjoying the benefits of Panda Planner. Click the Add to Cart button now and join them!

Panda Planner is a scientifically designed daily planner that will Empower you to take back control, Reclaim your happiness and flourish in every way

★ scientific approach to productivity & happiness - overwhelmed by the symptoms of Lyme disease, traumatic brain injury and cancer, our founder turned to the proven Research of positive psychology and neuroscience and created a system to get his life back on track

★ You are awesome - you might not feel that way all the time, but if you could just find a way to stay on top of your sh*t, everyone else would recognize how badass you really are. Panda Planner unlocks your organization & focus so you can hit your goals, every time

★ BONUSES & guarantee - included with your Panda Planner are some incredible eBooks (on topics like “how to crush your goals” and “a billionaire’s guide to productivity”) and a video mini-course on how to skyrocket Your productivity. If you don't feel happier and more productive, just reach out to us for a simple, no-hassle Refund

★ We believe that the demands and stressors of the modern world shouldn’t rob us of the lives we were meant to live. We believe that life is meant to be lived vibrantly! We are on a mission to help 10 million people Reclaim their happiness. Join the Panda movement!
